member.name: T:Infragistics.XF.AxisLabelsLocation
member.summary: Describes available locations of the axis labels in the chart.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.AxisLabelsLocation.OutsideTop
member.summary: Places the axis labels at the top, outside of the plotting area.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.AxisLabelsLocation.OutsideBottom
member.summary: Places the axis labels at the bottom, outside of the plotting area

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.AxisLabelsLocation.OutsideLeft
member.summary: Places the axis labels to the left, outside of the plotting area.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.AxisLabelsLocation.OutsideRight
member.summary: Places the axis labels to the right, outside of the plotting area.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.AxisLabelsLocation.InsideTop
member.summary: Places the axis labels inside the plotting area above the axis line.
member.remarks: CrossingAxis should be set for this setting to take effect.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.AxisLabelsLocation.InsideBottom
member.summary: Places the axis labels inside the plotting area below the axis line.
member.remarks: CrossingAxis should be set for this setting to take effect.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.AxisLabelsLocation.InsideLeft
member.summary: Places the axis labels inside the plotting area and to the left of the axis line.
member.remarks: CrossingAxis should be set for this setting to take effect.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.AxisLabelsLocation.InsideRight
member.summary: Places the axis labels inside the plotting area and to the right of the axis line.
member.remarks: CrossingAxis should be set for this setting to take effect.

member.name: P:Infragistics.XF.Controls.Series.Legend
member.summary: Gets or sets a legend for the current series object.
member.remarks:
If the Legend property is not set, the series will use the setting according to the parent DataCharts's Legend property.
This is generally expressed as an element name binding, as the Legend must exist at some other position in the layout. This property only indicates which Legend to use and will not alone cause the legend to be visible.

member.name: T:Infragistics.XF.Controls.AnnotationLayer
member.summary: Represents the base class for annotation layer types. Annotations will usually disable some of the default hover/touch behaviors of the chart when they are introduced to the series collection. In return they provide some valuable information as the cursor is moved by hovering over the chart, or performing a press-hold-drag interaction in touch mode.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.Controls.AnnotationLayer.UseIndexProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this series should take up an index for auto brush coloring.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.Controls.AnnotationLayer.UseLegendProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this series interacts with the chart legend.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.Controls.AnnotationLayer.CursorPositionProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the world position to use instead of the mouse position for this annotation layer. If you set this value, rather than responding to the mouse cursor, this layer will be fixed on the provided world position. A world position has x and y values that range from 0 to 1 that represent the global position of the cursor relative to the entire ranges of the axes. The default of (NaN, NaN) means that the layer should react to mouse movement.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.Controls.AnnotationLayer.IsDefaultCrosshairDisabledProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the series viewer's default crosshair should be disabled by the presence of this layer.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.Controls.AnnotationLayer.ShouldRenderAsOverlayProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this layer renders as an overlay or not.

member.name: P:Infragistics.XF.Controls.AnnotationLayer.UseIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this series should take up an index for auto brush coloring.

member.name: P:Infragistics.XF.Controls.AnnotationLayer.UseLegend
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this series interacts with the chart legend.

member.name: P:Infragistics.XF.Controls.AnnotationLayer.CursorPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the world position to use instead of the mouse position for this annotation layer. If you set this value, rather than responding to the mouse cursor, this layer will be fixed on the provided world position. A world position has x and y values that range from 0 to 1 that represent the global position of the cursor relative to the entire ranges of the axes. The default of (NaN, NaN) means that the layer should react to mouse movement.

member.summary: Collision avoidance is disabled.

member.summary: Items colliding with other items will be hidden from view.

member.summary: Items colliding with other items will be partially hidden from view by reducing their opacity.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.CollisionAvoidanceType.OmitAndShift
member.summary: Items colliding with other items will be either hidden from view or moved to new positions.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.CollisionAvoidanceType.FadeAndShift
member.summary: Items colliding with other items will be either partially hidden from view by reducing their opacity, or moved to new positions, or a combination of both.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the series animations should be allowed when a range change has been detected on an axis.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.Controls.SeriesViewer.WindowRectProperty
member.summary: A rectangle representing the portion of the SeriesViewer currently in view.
member.remarks: A rectangle at X=0, Y=0 with a Height and Width of 1 implies the entire plotting area is in view. A Height and Width of .5 would imply that the view is halfway zoomed in.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.Controls.SeriesViewer.UseTiledZoomingProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the series viewer should use cached tiles during zooms rather than the default live content.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.Controls.SeriesViewer.PreferHigherResolutionTilesProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the series viewer should prefer selecting higher resolution tiles over lower resolution tiles when performing tile zooming. Setting this to true will lower performance but increase quality.

member.name: F:Infragistics.XF.Controls.SeriesViewer.ZoomTileCacheSizeProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of zoom tiles that the series viewer should cache while in tiled zooming mode.
